videos.description: Luke Maye misses a layup and Garrison Brooks grabs the rebound and slams it down for UNC.
videos.headline: Brooks elevates for putback dunk

videos.description: As UNC trails Wake Forest, Luke Maye battles for an offensive rebound and puts it back in for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Maye shows determination with putback bucket

videos.description: Theo Pinson flies in to grab the offensive board and then is knocked down as he lays in the bucket.
videos.headline: Pinson lays out for and-1 layup

videos.description: Joel Berry II pulls up and then uses the shot fake before he sinks a long-range jump shot.
videos.headline: Berry fakes out defender on jumper

videos.description: Kenny Williams forces a turnover and then finishes with a big dunk for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Williams steals and throws down for UNC

videos.description: Brandon Childress feeds the ball to Doral Moore who finishes with a slam to cut UNC's lead.
videos.headline: Wake Forest answers with Moore dunk

videos.description: Bryant Crawford beats three defenders on his way to the basket for the lay in to extend Wake Forest's lead vs. No. 13 UNC.
videos.headline: Crawford makes tough layup for Wake Forest

videos.description: Joel Berry II sinks a runner to put UNC in the lead in the final seconds to avoid a loss vs. Wake Forest.
videos.headline: Berry drops game-winning floater
